alert.note: Alert for Lee (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 7:41PM CST until March 08 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi...Arkansas... Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing For the Lower Mississippi River...including Tiptonville, Caruthersville, Osceola, Memphis, Tunica Mhoon Landing, Helena... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO TUESDAY, MARCH 08... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing. * WHEN...From Monday morning to Tuesday, March 08. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Nel-Wyn Park at Tunica Lake begins to flood. Entrance road to Tunica River Park is flooded. Camp lots south of Flower Lake is flooding along with an extensive area of farmland at Ashley Point across from Mhoon Landing. Camp at Midway, Arkansas is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 28.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday morning to a crest of 30.0 feet Monday morning March 7th. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
